translations: n.方便，权宜；私利；权宜之计

sentences.sentence: But, the Reverend, also has excellent solutions, for expediencies of the moment, accomodated within his grand strategic plan!
sentences.translation: 不过，牧师，也有很好的解决办法，权宜之计的时候，住在他的宏伟的战略计划！

sentences.sentence: I've heard executives say that they can't win this battle of conscience because expediencies require lies, cover-ups, deceit, or game playing.
sentences.translation: 我听过一些老总说他们没法这样训练自我意识，因为权宜之计就需要谎言，欺骗，还有游戏。

sentences.sentence: Their work changed the way war was perceived, for it showed in uncompromising detail the horrors of death in war and the unceremonious expediencies of battlefield last rites.
sentences.translation: 他们的工作改变了感知战争的方式，因为它不折不扣地记录了战争死亡的恐怖和战场阵亡者死前的状态。
